And Heshbon shall cry, and Elealeh., Here he names other cities; for his design is to bind up, as it were, in a bundle all the cities of that country, that they may be involved in the general destruction; as if he had said, that none at all shall be exempted.

Therefore the light-armed soldiers of Moab shall howl,. Though ,על כן, (gnal ken) literally signifies therefore, yet some think that a reason is not here assigned; but that is of little importance. The Prophet shows that there will be none that does not howl,; for he declares that the bold and courageous shall mourn. Next he adds, the soul of every one shall howl to him., Every one shall be so engrossed with his own grief, that he will not think of his neighbors.
